text:
In addition to the regular program series, the
network has distributed three “dated” series, which
were given special handling because of their im¬
mediacy. Included were the provocative forum
conducted by the New York Herald Tribune, and
the Fourth Annual Conference of Businessmen
and Educators held under the auspices of the
Babcock Institute. The third special series is the
venerable University of Chicago Round Table,
which is distributed weekly, on a continuing basis,
to more than thirty stations.
